Title: Reimburses counties who have purchased or will purchase document management software designed specifically for the child welfare industry
Summary: Reimburses counties who have purchased or will purchase document management software designed specifically for the child welfare industry.
LawCode: Add ยง390-m, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the state reimbursement of county payments for certain document management software designed specifically for the child welfare industry
